name: Masa Network
description: Masa.ai provides AI-driven automation solutions designed to enhance business operations. It enables organizations to automate workflows, optimize tasks, and improve productivity with advanced AI tools.

chains.description:
The World's Personal Data Network

Masa is architecting the “decentralized Google” for the AI era. We are building an open, incentivized, and privacy-by-default economy for the world's personal data.
chains.name: MasaNetwork
